body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Laws & Policies     Superintendent's Compendium                Superintendent's Compendium       The superintendent's compendium (19.684 MB) is a compilation of special designations, closures, public use limits, permit requirements, and other restrictions imposed under the discretionary authority of the superintendent, in addition to what is contained in Title 36 of the Code of Federal Regulations (Chapter 1, Parts 1-7 and 34) (3.69 MB pdf), and other applicable federal statutes and regulations.
title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Superintendent's Compendium
